titleStmt.title: The old non-conformist, touching the Book of Common-prayer, and ceremonies. To which is annexed the reasons why Scotland refused the Book of Common-Prayer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by H.C. in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print fade with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Wales.
With: An expedient humbly presented to the King and Parliament for the happy settlement of ecclesiastical affairs.
